page.title: 12Wareham Health Centre Con'td
page.content:
Next to the clinic there is an ambulance station which is very useful to the clinic transporting elderly or badly injured patients.Patients have the right to choose their own doctor.The clinic is also provided with a Head of Clinic employed by the Comprehensive Services for vaccinations,family planning and medical records of patients. We surveyed 9 patients on the day of the interview revealing a wide range of age grouping and not one of the patients that we spoke to had the same reason for needing treatment.
END.
